content.title: Anomalous First Rib
content.description: Congenital abnormality of the first rib that may contribute to thoracic outlet syndrome.

clinical_features.mechanism: Altered anatomy narrows thoracic outlet space

tos_association.contribution: May cause or exacerbate TOS symptoms
tos_association.diagnosis: Plain radiograph or CT identifies anomaly

treatment.surgical: First rib resection including anomalous segment
treatment.approach: Transaxillary or supraclavicular depending on anatomy

content.clinical_pearl: Always obtain plain films in TOS evaluation to identify rib anomalies that alter surgical planning
